data.comment: The first-half is under way at Camp Nou - Barcelona kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Camp Nou - Barcelona kick-off to start the match.
Throw-in for Sociedad in their own half.
Throw-in Sociedad.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Ball safe as Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Barcelona, Sociedad push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Barcelona.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Barcelona's Martin Braithwaite gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Sociedad have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sociedad in their own half.
Barcelona drives forward and Martin Braithwaite gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Clement Lenglet is booked for the home team.
Martin Braithwaite for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Barcelona advance rapidly upfield but Juan Martinez Munuera blows for offside.
Sociedad drive upfield and Alexander Isak gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Barcelona defender.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Free kick for Sociedad in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sociedad to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Alexander Isak's header is off-target for Sociedad.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Ivan Rakitic. The finish is off target, however.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Sociedad a goal kick.
Barcelona pushes forward through Lionel Messi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Barcelona's Martin Braithwaite attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Sociedad a goal kick.
Sociedad push upfield and Ander Barrenetxea gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Barcelona defence.
Free kick for Sociedad in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Sociedad.
Important block from the Barcelona defence as Alexander Isak fires in a strike for Sociedad.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sociedad have a goal kick.
Free kick Barcelona.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sociedad in their own half.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Sociedad in the half of Barcelona.
Sociedad are caught offside.
Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at Camp Nou.
The second-half has commenced. Sociedad with the kick-off.
Sociedad's Ander Barrenetxea misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Sociedad throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Lionel Messi of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sociedad at Camp Nou.
In Barcelona, Martin Odegaard of Sociedad is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Mikel Merino for Sociedad has been booked by Juan Martinez Munuera and receives a first yellow card.
Barcelona push forward at Camp Nou and Lionel Messi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sociedad defence.
Sociedad are coming forward and Ander Barrenetxea gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
The away team replace Ander Barrenetxea with Mikel Oyarzabal.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Barcelona are pushing forward but Lionel Messi's finish is wide of the goal.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Sociedad a goal kick.
[36] is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gerard Pique (Barcelona) has received a first yellow card.
[36] is back on his feet again.
Barcelona needs to be cautious. Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ivan Rakitic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Barcelona's Gerard Pique goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ball goes out of play for a Sociedad goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Barcelona to check on Mikel Merino, who is grimacing with pain.
Gerard Pique is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Sociedad in their own half.
Mikel Merino has recovered and rejoins the match in Barcelona.
Gerard Pique for Barcelona is back on the field again.
Igor Zubeldia is replacing Diego Llorente for the away team.
Sociedad's Nacho Monreal gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Barcelona defender.
Corner awarded to Sociedad.
Sociedad are pushing forward but Mikel Oyarzabal's finish is wide of the goal.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Barcelona make their first substitution with Arturo Vidal replacing Ivan Rakitic.
Alexander Isak for Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Can Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Sociedad.
Ander Guevara (Sociedad) has received a yellow card from Juan Martinez Munuera.
Nacho Monreal of Sociedad gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Penalty! Juan Martinez Munuera points to the spot, great chance for Barcelona...
Mikel Oyarzabal (Sociedad) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Lionel Messi gives Barcelona a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sociedad in the half of Barcelona.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Imanol Alguacil is making the team's third substitution at Camp Nou with Willian Jose replacing Alexander Isak.
Ansu Fati is on a sub for Antoine Griezmann for Barcelona.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Sociedad, close to Barcelona's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Throw-in Sociedad.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sociedad in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sociedad.
At Camp Nou, Sergio Busquets has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Barcelona make their third substitution with Junior Firpo replacing Martin Braithwaite.
Corner awarded to Sociedad.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
[62] ([63]) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sociedad in Barcelona.
Goal kick for Sociedad at Camp Nou.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sociedad in their own half.
Barcelona's Ansu Fati is whistled for offside at Camp Nou.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
